Property RC2312.02

8.5-room duplex terrace house in the most tax-efficient municipality in AG (tax rate 48 %) 8966 Oberwil-Lieli

Large, light-flooded duplex terrace house (condominium) approx. 400 sqm living space with all-day sunshine, approx. 180 sqm terrace, five bedrooms, four bathrooms, large living/dining room 90 sqm, fitness room approx. 36 sqm, multi-purpose room approx. 40 sqm, 2 double garages, 6 parking spaces

Location

The idyllic community of Oberwil-Lieli is located in rural surroundings just 14 km (17 minutes by car) from the city limits of Zurich, 30 km from Zug and 26 km from Zurich Airport. A bus stop in front of the house takes you to Zurich Enge in just 20 minutes by express bus without stopping.

At the end of a dead-end street, in a quiet location, you can enjoy marvelous sunsets on the large terrace with plenty of privacy.

There are numerous leisure activities nearby: Football pitch, handball court, basketball court, skate park, beach volleyball court and large climbing tower with a slide.

The primary school and kindergarten are just 230 meters away and can be reached on foot in a few minutes without crossing any roads.

The grocery store Volg and organic farms are in the immediate vicinity.
